DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide information relative potency prasugrel clopidogrel platelet function study , inflammation , myocyte necrosis subject undergo elective percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Subjects Undergoing Cardiac Catheterization With Planned Percutaneous Coronary Intervention With Stenting
DOC.criteria: Subjects great equal 18 year age undergoing cardiac catheterization plan percutaneous coronary intervention ( coronary anatomy suitable ) indication chest pain +/or anginal equivalent felt treat physician relate coronary ischemia . At least one follow ( c ) : 1 . Functional study ( exercise , pharmacologic ) within past 8 week consistent ischemia manifest least one following : 1 . A reversible defect nuclear imaging . 2 . A reversible wallmotion abnormality echocardiography . 3 . Horizontal downsloping STdepressions great 1 mm electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ( image perform ) . 2 . Prior coronary revascularization [ percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) ] . 3 . A cardiac catheterization least one coronary artery lesion amenable PCI ( yet perform ) within 14 day prior enrollment . Known creatine kinasemyocardial band ( CKMB ) cardiac troponin great upper limit normal time screen Planned PCI acute myocardial infarction ( MI ) plan PCI within 48 hour fibrinolytic therapy ST segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) Have cardiogenic shock time screen ( systolic blood pressure 90 mm Hg associate clinical evidence endorgan hypoperfusion , subject require vasopressor maintain systolic blood pressure 90 mm Hg associate clinical evidence endorgan hypoperfusion ) . Refractory ventricular arrhythmia Have New York Heart Association Class IV congestive heart failure
